name: Maverick BioMetals
headline: Expanding Metal Production with Biology
description:
Maverick BioMetals is a biotechnology company advancing lithium processing. The company was founded by Eric Herrera, former Department of Defense scientist,  and Jesse Evans, former startup operations manager. 

We've developed a biological process to efficiently extract lithium from hard rock deposits. Our custom process is greener, more energy efficient, and cost effective compared to the current methods of extracting lithium. We're currently developing partnerships with mining companies to further the commercialization of our technology.

founders.name: Eric Herrera, Founder
founders.description: Synthetic Biologist and Explorer- I'm passionate about using biology in new ways to help change the world.

founders.name: Jesse Evans, Founder
founders.description: working on building bio-based solutions for a greener planet

# Modern Mineral Processing and Metal Extraction
Our first-of-its-kind BioExtraction™ technology achieves industry-leading 96% metal recovery with less water, heat, energy, and waste transforming mineral processing with sustainable solutions.
[CONTACT US](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672d260410f5819ad8c4160b/672d260410f5819ad8c41652_Hero.avif)
## We believe in a future powered by clean, sustainable energy.
**Extract more value from your ore.**
Traditional metallurgical processes are inefficient, leaving valuable metals behind and generating excessive waste. Maverick BioMetals' advanced technologies extract more metals at a lower cost, with significantly less waste, driving toward the full utilization of ores and a more efficient future in mineral processing.
[More About Us](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</about>)
## our solutions
Our solutions revolutionize resource extraction, processing, and waste management, delivering sustainable, high-efficiency outcomes for a cleaner, greener future.
[More about our Technology](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</technology>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672d260410f5819ad8c4160b/672d260410f5819ad8c416ac_Frame%20871.webp)ExtractionEfficient mineral processing and metal extraction with minimal environmental impact.](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</solutions>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672d260410f5819ad8c4160b/672d260410f5819ad8c416aa_Frame%20873.webp)beneficiationOptimize the quality and value of extracted resources through advanced processing.](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</solutions>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/672d260410f5819ad8c4160b/672d260410f5819ad8c416ab_Frame%20866.webp)TailingsSafely manage and repurpose mining waste, eliminating hazardous byproducts.](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com/</solutions>)
## Our Partners
Partnering with the best to drive innovation forward. Meet the organizations we collaborate with.

generated_description:
**Maverick BioMetals: A New Era in Lithium Processing**

Maverick BioMetals is not your typical biotech company; it's on a mission to revolutionize metal production through innovative biological processes. Founded in 2022 by Eric Herrera, a former Department of Defense scientist, and Jesse Evans, an experienced startup operations manager, the company is bringing new life to the lithium extraction industry.

**What's the Big Idea?**

At its core, Maverick BioMetals has developed a pioneering technique called BioExtraction™. This process allows for the efficient extraction of lithium from hard rock deposits using significantly less water, energy, and generating much less waste compared to conventional methods. Think of it as a greener, smarter approach to mining that could redefine how we source lithium, a critical component for batteries and clean energy technologies.

With a small yet dynamic team of nine based in San Antonio, Texas, Maverick BioMetals is currently leveraging partnerships with mining companies to scale up its technology and start reshaping the industry landscape.

**The Environmentally Conscious Pathfinder**

The company's commitment goes beyond just innovation; it’s deeply rooted in sustainability. Maverick’s solutions strive for a cleaner future by ensuring that the extraction and processing of metals are performed with minimal environmental impact. Their technology boasts a remarkable 96% metal recovery rate, which means they’re not just extracting metals but doing it efficiently.

Maverick BioMetals is part of Y Combinator’s Batch S22, placing them in a network of startups that have been vetted and are poised for growth. 

**A Vision for the Future**

The founders believe in a future fueled by clean, sustainable energy. By enhancing the efficiency of resource extraction and processing, Maverick BioMetals is aiming to unlock previously untapped resources while reducing the environmental impact that has historically plagued the mining sector. 

In their own words, they want to help others "extract more value from your ore." This encapsulates not just their technological promise but also their vision for transforming an industry that badly needs change.

**Get Involved**

Whether you’re a mining company looking for innovative extraction solutions, or just someone interested in sustainable biotechnology, check out their website at [MaverickBioMetals.com](https://www.MaverickBioMetals.com) to learn more about their mission, technology, and potential partnership opportunities.

In a climate where sustainability and innovation must go hand in hand, Maverick BioMetals is certainly one to watch as they lead the charge into a cleaner future.
